talk.chat:
Guard Glen:
If you must blame someone for the situation, you should look beyond the monsters. I won't name names, but the wandering merchants are certainly part of the problem. They have no loyalty whatsoever for this village! They only think about adena!
The Dwarven and Orcish merchants are the worst! Rivalries between the two races are threatening to boil over at any moment! This is bound to end horribly!
Return

Guard Glen:
You may not enter the village if you possess contraband or your identification is not in order. I'll need to check your papers and belongings. Thanks for your cooperation.
Is this your first time here? This is a dangerous place for adventurers, my friend! Captain Vishotsky keeps the peace here, but the forest out there is a different matter! All sorts of vicious monsters lurk just outside the walls of this village! Even the mighty Vishotsky can't kill all of them!
"Please describe the structure of the upper and lower levels."
"Who is the lord of the manor and what is the tax rate?"
Quest
